person.persName: Nelson Trusler (Connersville, Indiana, lawyer and soldier)

body.p: Connersville, Indiana, lawyer and soldier. Indiana native. Married to Solome Stanton Trusler on December 2, 1847. Father of Preston Trusler, Mary S. Trusler, Edna H. Trusler, and Pincney G. Trusler. Lawyer in Connersville in 1850 and 1860. Served in the 84th Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as colonel in 1862.
